entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:25 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 10:12 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 10:12 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 10:12 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
